name: BEGINNINGS
description: Prague’s origins date back to the 9th century when the Přemyslid dynasty founded a castle above the Vltava River.

name: CHARLES BRIDGE
description: A famous bridge connecting the Old Town with Lesser Town.

name: LETNÁ
description: A vibrant district known for its large park, beer gardens, and stunning city views.

name: MALÁ STRANA
description: A historic and picturesque area with Baroque architecture and charming narrow streets.

name: ŽIŽKOV
description: A lively, alternative neighborhood famous for its nightlife and the iconic TV Tower.

name: HOLEŠOVICE
description: A trendy, evolving district blending art, industry, and modern cafés.
